snippet: The 30-year-old Colombian Camilo Villegas, a three-time PGA Tour winner, battled in qualifying school beside players like Henrik Norlander, who earned his 2013 tour card.
abstract: Camilo Villegas, three-time PGA Tour winner who was once widely considered an emerging star, is struggling to earn his playing privileges for 2013.
lead_paragraph: The 30-year-old Colombian Camilo Villegas, a three-time PGA Tour winner, battled in qualifying school beside players like Henrik Norlander, who earned his 2013 tour card.

headline.seo: Camilo Villegas, Golf’s Top 2006 Rookie, Struggles at Q-School
headline.main: Once Stamped for Stardom, Now in a Struggle
headline.print_headline: Once Stamped for Stardom, Now in a Struggle
